verbs.description: [ARG0: photos] [V: give] [ARG1: an inside look into a creepy abandoned disney water park] a photographer has been banned from disney parks after he took photos of an abandoned water park formerly known as river country in lake buena vista fla to reveal the dark side of the mega company he told multiple outlets disney world communications walt disney parks and resorts river country disney island the walt disney company buzzfeed seph lawless lake buena vista florida
